attributes.action: Supermarkets to prevent the spread of COVID-19
attributes.additional_details: Make it law for this pandemic that supermarkets make these changes NOW and save lives. They have a duty of care for the customers and staff. Let’s prevent the spread as thousands of customers are shopping in a very dangerous environment and staff too. Please let common sense prevail and save lives.
attributes.background: To enforce supermarkets to make the above changes I have mentioned and we can prevent the spread of the virus which is causing the daily infectious cases, hospitalisation and death.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
